content.rendered:
Directed by Marc Forster

Written by Fredrik Backman. David Magee. David Magee

Star Tom Hanks(Otto).Rachel Keller. Kailey Hyman(Barb).Manuel Garcia-Rulfo.Cameron Britton.Mike Birbiglia.Mariana Treviño. Elle Chapman(Sarah). Kelly Lamor Wilson(Shari Kenzie). Lavel Schley(Young Reuben). Josefine Lindegaard(Julia). Christiana Montoya(Luna). Spenser Granese(Nick). Juanita Jennings(Anita). Julian Manjerico(Beppo The Clown). Nayab Hussain(Dr. Ellis). Alessandra Perez(Abbie). Jon Donahue(Dudley). Robyne Parrish(Realtor). Robin K. Johnson(Anna). Kirk Kelly(Neighbor). Bryant Carroll(Train Conductor). Branislav R. Tatalovic(Train passenger). Ashley Dacek(Train Commuter). Phil Nardozzi(Tourist / Hospital Patient). Alex Haines(College Student). Greg Allan Martin(Lucas). Peter Lawson Jones(Reuben). Emonie Ellison(young Anita). Floyd Jackson(Neighbor). Barton Bund(Doctor). Aaron Marcus(Business Man (saved by Otto)). Max Pavel(Andy). William Wilmoth(Groundskeeper). Carl Clemons(Stimco Steel Co-Worker #4). Allyson R. Hood(Stimco Co-Worker #2). Allen Michael Harris(Civilian). Rhett Farquhar(Marisol toddler). Martina Castelli(Nurse). Todd C. Adelman(Train Station Commuter (uncredited)). Angie Bienemann(Reoccurring Train Passenger (uncredited)). Lisa Coffey(Train Commuter (uncredited)). Dave Edmonds(Train Station Passenger (uncredited)). Joe Fishel(Doctor (uncredited)). Xander Goldman(Train passenger at station (uncredited)). Tania S. Grant(Train Passenger (uncredited)). Dustin Heavilin(Passenger for a Train (uncredited)). Gina Jun(Neighbor (uncredited)). Daniel Lamont(Traveler (uncredited)). Johnna Leary(Neighbor (uncredited)). Rolando Mays(Pedestrian (uncredited)). Gabrielle McAndrew(Train Station Staff (uncredited)). Mark Murtha(Train Passenger (uncredited)). Olivia Pagone(College Student (uncredited)). Frankie Palombi(Neighbor (uncredited)). Roger Petan(Train passenger (uncredited)). Rebecca Phipps(Pedestrian (uncredited)). Hilda Ivette Rodriguez(Neighbor (uncredited)). Jay Stockslader(Motel resident (uncredited)). Stephanie Swift(Neighbor at Shower (uncredited)). Valena Zitello(Graduation Student (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Neda Backman. Marc Forster. Gary Goetzman. Tom Hanks. Tor Jonasson. Tim King. David Magee. Michael Porseryd. Louise Rosner. Steve Shareshian. Fredrik Wikström. Rita Wilson. Renée Wolfe

Production 2DUX². Playtone. SF Productions
